title: Thermo Fisher Scientific on Pace for Largest Percent Decrease Since December 2017 — Data Talk
text:
Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (TMO) is currently at $275.65, down $13.51 or 4.67%

-- Would be lowest close since Aug. 27, 2019, when it closed at $272.93

-- On pace for largest percent decrease since Dec. 4, 2017, when it fell 5.29%

-- Down 5.36% month-to-date

-- Up 23.17% year-to-date; on pace for best year since 2017, when it rose 34.57%

-- Down 9.75% from its all-time closing high of $305.43 on July 3, 2019

-- Up 14.87% from 52 weeks ago (Oct. 9, 2018), when it closed at $239.97

-- Down 9.75% from its 52 week closing high of $305.43 on July 3, 2019

-- Up 32.23% from its 52 week closing low of $208.47 on Dec. 24, 2018

-- Fifth worst performer in the S&P 500 today

All data as of 10:35:04 AM

Source: Dow Jones Market Data, FactSet

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 08, 2019 10:56 ET (14:56 GMT)
